typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		driverId as integer,
		name as string,
		ssn as string,
		location as string,
		certified as boolean,
		{wage-plan} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> driversCSV
source(output(
		driverId as integer,
		week as integer,
		{hours-logged} as integer,
		{miles-logged} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> timesheetCSV
